objects.text:
• Premium Leather Construction
• Hand-Stitched Details
• Ergonomic Cushioned Footbed
• Limited Edition Series

product_details.name: Luxe Boho Leather Sneaker - Handcrafted Artisan Comfort
product_details.description:
• Premium leather construction with intricate bohemian design details
• Hand-stitched scalloped patterns and decorative embellishments
• Soft interior lining for maximum comfort
• Unique textured rubber sole for enhanced grip and durability
• Two-tone cream and tan color palette for versatile styling
• Ergonomic cushioned footbed for all-day comfort
• Traditional lace-up design with rustic brown laces
• Artisanal craftsmanship with detailed leather work
• Perfect blend of style and comfort for casual wear
• Available in limited edition handcrafted series

banner_details:
This banner presents a premium, handcrafted footwear product with a boho aesthetic. It features a bold heading ("heading") and a strong subheading ("subheading") at the top to convey the artisanal nature of the item. A descriptive list ("description") outlines the key features like premium leather and ergonomic footbed. Highlighted in striking red is a promotional message ("tagline") just above a spacious image of the product ("product_image") for visual appeal. The pricing ("price") is prominently displayed in rustic bold type. A contrasting call-to-action button ("cta") with background ("cta_background") encourages immediate purchase. Decorative arcs and curves enhance its artisanal vibe.

**Color palette:**
- Cream (#F5EFE7)
- Taupe (#D0A98F)
- Warm Brown (#B08968)
- Deep Cocoa (#5D4037)
- Burnt Rust (#8D5B4C)
- Terracotta Red (#C43E00)
- White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image showcases a creatively designed shoe with a visually warm and earthy color palette. Dominant colors include a creamy beige (#F5D8A7) and rich butterscotch brown (#C66B2C), harmonized with accents of terracotta orange (#D57933) seen in the laces and intricate trim. The use of light tan (#EBD3B2) adds softness, while the white highlights (#FFFFFF) provide contrast and emphasis to patterns. The sole is a deeper burnt sienna (#8D3E1F), anchoring the palette. Colors are smoothly blended in gradient layers, with shadows and highlights used effectively to enhance the shoe’s depth and structure, making it ideal for warm, artisan-themed ad banners.
